necessary.name: Cookies necesarias

marketing.name: Cookies de marketing

meta.description: Descubre los mejores sitios espirituales y esotéricos, cuidadosamente seleccionados y clasificados por tema. Encuentra recursos confiables para meditación, metafísica, adivinación, sanación energética y más.

site.name: Kasamba: Established Online Psychic Reading Marketplace
site.tagline: Connect with verified psychics for live chat and phone readings across tarot, astrology, mediumship, and 20+ spiritual disciplines.
site.overview:
Kasamba is a veteran online psychic marketplace operating for over 20 years, connecting users with hundreds of verified spiritual advisors for live chat and phone consultations. The platform covers an extensive range of divination services including tarot, astrology, numerology, mediumship, dream analysis, and palm readings.

With a rigorous advisor screening process accepting less than 10% of applicants, Kasamba emphasizes quality over quantity. The platform boasts 4+ million five-star ratings and offers new users 3 free minutes with up to 3 different advisors, plus a satisfaction guarantee on first readings.

Pricing ranges from $1.99 to $39.99 per minute depending on advisor experience, with promotional discounts of 10-40% frequently available. Free horoscopes and educational articles complement the paid reading services.

features.name: Live Chat Readings
features.description: Real-time text-based consultations with psychic advisors available 24/7, allowing anonymous and confidential sessions with saved transcripts for future reference.

features.name: Phone/Voice Readings
features.description: Voice call consultations with advisors for more personal, verbal exchanges at premium rates.

features.name: Email Readings
features.description: Asynchronous email consultations for users who prefer written responses they can revisit, allowing thoughtful advisor responses without real-time pressure.

features.name: Best Match Guarantee
features.description: Three free chat minutes with up to three different advisors, allowing users to find their ideal psychic match before committing financially.

features.name: Satisfaction Guarantee
features.description: Refund option available within 7 days if unsatisfied with first reading, demonstrating platform confidence in service quality.

features.name: Rigorous Advisor Verification
features.description: Four-stage screening including identity verification, live skill assessment, profile moderation, and ongoing performance review. Less than 10% of applicants accepted.

features.name: Extensive Service Categories
features.description: Over 24 distinct reading types including tarot, astrology, numerology, mediumship, palm reading, dream analysis, career forecasts, love psychics, and specialized services like pet psychics and past life readings.

features.name: Free Daily Horoscopes
features.description: Complimentary daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly horoscopes for all zodiac signs, plus birthday horoscopes and career/love forecasts.

features.name: Educational Article Library
features.description: Comprehensive resource section with articles on tarot interpretation, astrology basics, relationship advice, spiritual practices, and more across 8 main categories.

features.name: Advanced Advisor Filtering
features.description: Browse by price range, availability status, ratings, years of experience, total readings completed, and advisor specialty badges.

features.name: Promotional Discount System
features.description: Active coupon system offering 10-40% discounts plus 2% cashback program on paid sessions.

features.name: Mobile Application
features.description: Dedicated iOS and Android apps for on-the-go access to readings, advisor browsing, and account management.

features.name: Session Transcripts
features.description: Chat reading transcripts saved automatically for users to review insights and guidance at any time after the session.

pros.point: Extensive advisor selection with rigorous vetting
pros.details: With 500+ verified advisors across 24+ specialties and less than 10% applicant acceptance rate, users have access to thoroughly screened practitioners with demonstrated abilities.
New users can try 3 different advisors for free before paying, allowing informed selection without financial commitment.
Over 20 years in business with 4+ million five-star ratings demonstrates market-proven reliability and sustained customer satisfaction.
Daily horoscopes, birthday readings, educational articles, and tarot guides provide substantial value without requiring payment.
Clear per-minute rates, visible rating scores, reading counts, and years of experience help users make informed choices.
Advisors from around the world ensure round-the-clock access to readings regardless of user timezone.
Live chat and phone readings accommodate different user preferences for anonymity, convenience, or personal connection.

cons.details: With rates up to $39.99/minute for premium advisors, extended sessions can become expensive. A 30-minute reading with a mid-tier advisor could cost $150-300.

cons.point: Credit card required for free trial
cons.details: Despite offering free minutes, users must provide payment information upfront, which may deter privacy-conscious visitors.
Terms explicitly state services are 'for entertainment purposes only' and advisors are independent contractors, limiting platform liability for advice accuracy.

Refunds only within 7 days at Kasamba's sole discretion. Mandatory arbitration with class action waiver for disputes. $100 maximum liability cap. Inactive accounts (12+ months) incur up to $5/month maintenance fees. Late payments subject to 2% monthly interest.
Online support portal at support.kasamba.com is access-restricted and may require user login. Alternative contact via email (support@kasamba.com) and phone lines available.

features: 3 free chat minutes with 3 new advisors
freeTier.limitations: Free minutes only with advisors user hasn't previously consulted; credit card required for registration

paidPlans.name: Pay-Per-Minute Readings
features: Voice call readings at advisor-set rates
Payment via credit card, debit card, or PayPal
paidPlans.bestFor: Users seeking affordable entry-level readings or budget-conscious consultations

paidPlans.name: Premium Advisor Readings
features: Access to highest-rated advisors (e.g., Master Enigma: 347,000+ readings)
paidPlans.bestFor: Users prioritizing proven track records and premium expertise

pricing.valueAssessment: Kasamba's pay-per-minute model offers flexibility but requires careful session management to control costs. Entry-level pricing at $1.99/minute is competitive for the industry, though premium advisors at $39.99/minute represent significant investment. The 3-minute free trial with multiple advisors provides genuine opportunity to assess fit before payment. Promotional discounts of 10-40% and 2% cashback help offset costs for regular users.

history.company: Kasamba Inc. (US) / adviqo GmbH (EU) / adviqo UK Limited (UK)
history.headquarters: San Francisco, CA, USA (182 Howard St UNIT 826, San Francisco, CA 94105)
history.story:
Kasamba has operated as an online psychic marketplace for over two decades, establishing itself as one of the longest-running platforms in the digital divination space. The platform emerged during the early 2000s internet boom and has maintained continuous operation since.

The company operates as Kasamba Inc. headquartered in San Francisco, California, with international operations managed through adviqo GmbH in Berlin, Germany (EU Representative) and adviqo UK Limited in Norwich (UK Representative). This multi-jurisdictional corporate structure reflects the platform's global reach and regulatory compliance across the United States, European Union, and United Kingdom.

Throughout its history, Kasamba has accumulated over 4 million five-star ratings and reviews, serving millions of clients globally. The platform has evolved from early web-based chat services to include mobile applications, voice calling, and sophisticated advisor matching systems while maintaining its core marketplace model connecting seekers with spiritual advisors.

primaryUsers: Adults seeking spiritual guidance and life direction
People dealing with grief seeking medium connections
Those interested in astrology and horoscope insights
targetAudience.idealFor:
Relationship Guidance Seekers: Extensive love and relationship psychic category with soulmate matching, compatibility analysis, and reconciliation guidance. Multiple advisors specialize exclusively in romantic matters.

Spiritual Explorers: Wide variety of divination methods from traditional tarot and astrology to niche services like rune casting, crystal readings, and past life exploration allow sampling multiple practices.

Grief Support Seekers: Dedicated mediumship category with mental mediumship and channeling services for those wishing to connect with deceased loved ones.

Privacy-Conscious Users: Anonymous chat readings with SSL encryption and no requirement to share personal details with advisors beyond chosen display name.

Busy Professionals: 24/7 availability, mobile app access, and text-based chat options accommodate irregular schedules and discrete consultations during work breaks.
targetAudience.notIdealFor:
Budget-Constrained Users: Per-minute pricing accumulates quickly, and meaningful readings typically require 15-30 minutes. Users with limited budgets may find costs prohibitive for regular use.

Skeptics Seeking Proof: Platform explicitly disclaims services as entertainment and makes no accuracy guarantees. Those requiring verifiable predictions will be disappointed.

Users Seeking Long-Term Therapeutic Support: Psychic readings are not substitutes for mental health counseling. The platform disclaims responsibility for advice outcomes and advisors are not licensed therapists.

navigation.notes: Clear category-based navigation with 10+ main service types easily accessible. Advisor filtering by price, rating, and specialty works well. Some deeper pages like support center have accessibility issues.

design.notes: Clean, professional interface with dark theme elements. Advisor cards display essential information at a glance including ratings, reading counts, and availability status. Mobile-responsive layout adapts well across devices.

mobileExperience.notes: Dedicated iOS and Android applications available. Website fully responsive with touch-friendly navigation. Chat interface optimized for mobile typing.

accessibility.notes: Standard web accessibility with readable fonts and adequate contrast. No explicit accessibility statement found. Some interactive elements may present challenges for screen readers.

pageSpeed.notes: Homepage loads reasonable amount of content including advisor carousels and promotional banners. Some JavaScript-dependent features may increase initial load time.

depth.notes: Extensive educational articles covering multiple divination disciplines. Individual service category pages provide thorough explanations of reading types. Advisor profiles include detailed biographies and specialties.

multimedia.qualityNotes: Advisor photos and category imagery present. Interactive elements include advisor filtering, chat interface, and horoscope selectors. Limited video content observed.

contactability.notes: Multiple contact channels available: support@kasamba.com for general inquiries, privacy@kasamba.com for privacy matters. Phone support via EU (+49 30 22445 0) and UK (+44 203 835 5700) offices. Physical addresses disclosed for US (San Francisco), Germany (Berlin), and UK (Norwich). Zendesk support portal at support.kasamba.com (may require authentication).

legitimacy.companyName: Barges Technologies, Inc. / adviqo GmbH / adviqo UK Limited
legitimacy.notes: Full corporate structure disclosed: US parent Barges Technologies, Inc. (San Francisco), EU operations via adviqo GmbH (Berlin), UK operations via adviqo UK Limited (Norwich). Over 20 years operational history. No individual team members or leadership publicly visible.

legal.notes: Comprehensive privacy policy (August 2025) with GDPR/CCPA compliance. Terms (April 2025) include mandatory arbitration, class action waiver, entertainment disclaimer, $100 liability cap, 7-day refund window, and $5/month maintenance fee on inactive accounts (12+ months). Governed by New York state law.

trustCredibility.summary: Kasamba demonstrates reasonable credibility through two decades of operation, rigorous advisor vetting, and comprehensive legal documentation. The mandatory arbitration clause with class action waiver, entertainment disclaimer, and $100 maximum liability cap warrant careful consideration. Trust is supported by the advisor verification process accepting less than 10% of applicants, 4+ million accumulated ratings, and full corporate transparency with disclosed US, EU, and UK legal entities.

faq.question: What is Kasamba and what services does it offer?
faq.answer: Kasamba is an online psychic marketplace operating since 2003, connecting users with over 500 verified spiritual advisors. Services include tarot readings, astrology consultations, numerology, mediumship, dream analysis, palm readings, love psychics, career forecasts, and 15+ additional divination specialties. Readings are available via live chat and phone 24/7.

faq.question: Is Kasamba free to use?
faq.answer: Kasamba offers a free trial of 3 chat minutes with up to 3 different advisors for new users. Free content includes daily/weekly/monthly horoscopes, birthday horoscopes, and educational articles. Paid readings range from $1.99 to $39.99 per minute depending on advisor experience and specialty. Credit card registration is required even for free minutes.

faq.question: Is Kasamba legitimate and trustworthy?
faq.answer: Kasamba has operated for over 20 years with 4+ million five-star ratings. The platform employs a rigorous 4-stage advisor verification process, accepting less than 10% of applicants. Corporate entities are disclosed (adviqo GmbH in Germany, adviqo UK Limited in UK). Services are classified as entertainment, and individual advisor accuracy is not guaranteed by the platform.

faq.question: How much do Kasamba readings cost?
faq.answer: Kasamba uses per-minute pricing ranging from $1.99 to $39.99 depending on the advisor. Promotional discounts of 10-40% are frequently available, plus a 2% cashback program. New users receive 3 free minutes. A typical 20-minute reading with a mid-range advisor might cost $60-100 without promotions.

faq.question: How do I choose an advisor on Kasamba?
faq.answer: Kasamba provides filtering by price range, specialty, availability status, and advisor badges (Top Rated, Top Accuracy, Trending). Each advisor profile displays their rating, total readings completed, years on the platform, and detailed biography. The free 3-minute trial allows testing compatibility before committing to paid sessions.

faq.question: Can I get a refund from Kasamba?
faq.answer: Kasamba offers a satisfaction guarantee with refunds available within 7 days of your session, at the company's discretion for limited circumstances. Unused account balances can be requested through support. Accounts inactive for 12+ months may incur monthly maintenance fees up to $5.

faq.question: What is Kasamba's advisor verification process?
faq.answer: Kasamba screens advisors through four stages: identity verification, live skill assessment with evaluation team, profile moderation for ethical compliance, and ongoing performance monitoring based on client feedback. Less than 10% of applicants are accepted. Underperforming advisors can be suspended or removed.

faq.question: Does Kasamba have a mobile app?
faq.answer: Yes, Kasamba offers dedicated mobile applications for iOS and Android devices. The apps provide full access to advisor browsing, live chat readings, account management, and promotional offers. The main website is also fully responsive for mobile browser access.

faq.question: What types of psychic readings are available on Kasamba?
faq.answer: Kasamba offers 24+ reading types including: tarot, astrology (Western, Vedic, Chinese), numerology, mediumship, dream analysis, palm reading, aura reading, crystal reading, rune casting, angel card readings, past life readings, spell casting, pet psychics, career forecasts, love/relationship guidance, and fortune telling.

faq.question: How does Kasamba compare to other psychic websites?
faq.answer: Kasamba differentiates through 20+ years operational history, strict 10% advisor acceptance rate, 500+ available advisors, and comprehensive free content. The platform competes on selection breadth and verification rigor rather than lowest pricing. Per-minute rates are comparable to industry standards.

faq.question: Are Kasamba psychic readings accurate?
faq.answer: Kasamba cannot guarantee accuracy as readings are classified as entertainment services. Advisor quality varies; the platform's verification process assesses skills but individual accuracy depends on the practitioner. User reviews and 4+ million ratings provide insight into advisor track records, though personal experience varies.

faq.question: Is my information private on Kasamba?
faq.answer: Kasamba uses SSL encryption for payments and allows anonymous usernames for readings. The privacy policy details data collection (email, name, chat transcripts, IP addresses) and sharing with payment processors and service providers. EU/UK residents have GDPR rights; California residents have CCPA rights. Privacy inquiries go to privacy@kasamba.com.

summary.recommendation:
Kasamba stands as one of the most established online psychic marketplaces, offering a legitimate platform for those seeking spiritual guidance, divination services, and intuitive readings. With over 20 years of operation and a stringent advisor approval process accepting less than 10% of applicants, the platform prioritizes quality practitioners over quantity.

The platform excels for users seeking variety and convenience: 24/7 availability across 24+ reading categories, 500+ verified advisors, and flexible communication through chat or phone. The 3-minute free trial with multiple advisors provides genuine opportunity to find compatible practitioners before financial commitment. Substantial free content including daily horoscopes and educational articles adds value for casual visitors.

Budget-conscious users should approach with caution. Per-minute pricing from $1.99 to $39.99 can accumulate rapidly during meaningful sessions, and the credit card requirement for free trials may deter privacy-focused individuals. The entertainment disclaimer limiting platform accountability for advice accuracy is standard industry practice but worth acknowledging.

For those seeking spiritual insights with reasonable expectations, Kasamba offers a reliable, feature-rich marketplace backed by longevity and demonstrated user satisfaction. The platform merits a 7.5/10 rating—strong on features and selection, moderate on value proposition and trust factors given industry-standard disclaimers.

callToAction.ctaDescription: Start with 3 free minutes from multiple advisors to find your perfect psychic match.
